column4: Hi everyone, I've messed up my wireless configuration and I need a step-by-step guide to restore settings to what they are on a fresh install. Any help would be appreciated
yeah, did that. Wireless device doesn't appear
did you ask me to restart?
yes.  While it is restarting, make sure the wireless cord is plugged in right.
If it is USB make sure it is connected right
ok. I booted in recovery mode, nothing out of the ordinary appeared, no errors
can you tell me what I should do to clean up my wireless settings?
it seems to work when I'm in recovery mode
paste the code into any text manager
